about_the_game:
Available with Meta Quest

Kore VR offers a unique experience that transports you to the heart of a traditional Korean Hanok village. From there, you can explore a futuristic and interactive orb that teaches you the sounds of each Korean alphabet, as well as a shooting arena where you'll use a laser blaster to shoot letters and gather ingredients for delicious Korean dishes in just three minutes. But beware - if you don't get the letters right, you'll be "roasted" in Korean!

With Kore VR, you can immerse yourself in the Korean language and culture in a fun and engaging way. The serene landscape of the Hanok village creates the perfect backdrop for learning the characters and pronunciation of Hangeul. And as you explore the village and its surroundings, you'll gain a deeper understanding and appreciation for Korean culture.

Whether you're a beginner or an experienced learner, Kore VR is an innovative and effective way to build a strong foundation in the Korean language. Through its combination of language learning and cultural immersion, Kore VR can enhance your overall language skills and provide you with a truly unforgettable experience.

short_description: Want to learn the Korean alphabet on the Meta Quest? Hop into Kore VR where you get to learn the alphabet in an interactive orb and shoot away letters in an interactive arena to win ingredients for delicious Korean dishes. Get those letters right or you will get roasted in Korean!
